divs: Sighting Details i was outside smoking as i usually do at night, i always look up because i have seen meteores satalights planets ect, i noticed a bright silver disc moving from west to east, i watched it for mabe 2 minutes, then it went straight up at a 45 dagree angle and dissapeared. there were no sound of any engine or turbines, no nav lights. a comercial aircraft was in its general area and had to notice the object, the comercial flight was heading north, northwest. this is not the first object i have seen. me and my son and a neighbor was outside and noticed 4 silver disc, we watched the disc for about 5 minutes and then they dissapeared one by one. 5 minutes later 2 f 14s or 15s flew right up under where they were at, this location was in lilburn georgia about 6 to 7 years ago in broad daylight, i have been through other things before also that i would only talk about in person.i have been in astronomy since i was ten , i was in law enforcement for years on night shift. i might want to join your team of mufon investigators.
Summary: silver glow very bright like venus
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Woodstock
There were no other sightings in Woodstock on or around June 30th 2011
